name: Model of Natural General Intelligence
short_description: Framework for modelling of Natural General Intelligence. This project aims at creation of open source AGI (Artificial General Intelligence) through modelling of natural thinking. See http://roland.pri.ee/bakalaureusetoo/ for theoretical details.
